services.title: CV Design
services.shortDescription: Professional CV design services tailored for students and professionals
services.fullDescription: Our CV design service helps you stand out to potential employers. We create clean, modern, and ATS-friendly CVs that highlight your skills and experience effectively. Each CV is customized to match your career goals and industry standards.

services.title: Assignment Help
services.shortDescription: Expert assistance with academic assignments and research papers
services.fullDescription: Get professional help with your academic assignments from our team of experienced tutors and subject matter experts. We provide guidance, resources, and support to help you achieve better grades and understand complex topics.

services.title: Student Mentoring
services.shortDescription: One-on-one mentoring sessions for academic and career guidance
services.fullDescription: Our mentoring program connects you with experienced professionals who can guide you through your academic journey and early career decisions. Regular sessions help build your confidence, improve your skills, and plan your academic and professional path.
